name: ExMas
description:
You, the loyal gunman of an oppressive regime, have received your holiday orders... Destroy Christmas. Your leaders have made a decision, not a single person in the country deserves a Christmas gift. Your mission? Destroy every toy that Santa attempts to deliver. Despite the yuletide carol, there will be nothing silent about this night.

What People are saying: "A lot less buggy than Cyber Punk 2077"
- dustinisgodmagazine.com "Its like playing the Grinch, if the Grinch was armed ... competent."
- Strawberry News
 "As a parent, I really like to use this game to teach my children what Christmas is like in less fortunate countries."
- Megan
